name: Kairos Website
desc: Kairos needed a new website for their company with features like portfolio display/filtering, CMS capabilities etc. I built the site from the ground up handling everything from the layout to the database design.
clientDesc: Kairos is a not-for-profit consultancy company based out of Austria

gallery.caption: Fully responsive layout on a variety of devices. Pure.css was used for the grid layout.
Projects page populated by HTTP requests to a REST API in PHP which fetches the data from a MySQL database.
Contacts page populated by HTTP requests to a REST API in PHP which fetches the data from a MySQL database.
Bootstrap based lightbox modal and gallery for images.
Angular filters to sort/filter the data on various parameters.
Full dual language support with the click of a button using state parameters.
Custom CMS with complete CRUD functionalities using a REST API coded in PHP.
Image upload and retrieval via PHP.
SQL database design.

name: ELiquid Canada Website
desc: ELiquid needed a new website for their ecommerce company. I was provided the initial design which I converted to an Angular 2 SPA implementing standard ecommerce website functionalities like product filtering, CRUD functionalities for sellers/admins etc. I also handled the database design as well as building a RESTful API for the frontend to communicate with the database.
clientDesc: ELiquid Canada is an e-commerce platform for vapes (e-cigarretes)

gallery.caption: Home page populated by a RESTful API coded in PHP.
Angular filters for filtering products according to various criteria.
Filters in action displaying products of a certain company.
Product pages populated via route ids in the url.
Sliding wishlist/cart functionality.
CRUD functionality using a RESTful API coded in PHP and a MySQL database.
Orders interface for each seller ordered by buyer and buyer type.
Interface for website admin to change lists displayed on the home page.
SQL database design.

gallery.caption: Minimalist main UI with an input slider and a radial progress bar for output.
Panel slides away to reveal more detailed output parameters.
Tabbed structure for the various inputs on the left.
Color changes to indicate positive/negative effects.
Panels for each output parameter to see dependent inputs.
